name: jsobfuscator
description: Code Obfuscator, javaScript Obfuscator, Obfuscator. This extension will convert all your JavaScript Code in minifier version and also Obfuscator them to make it secure. Thanks for using :)

JSObfuscator.overwriteExistingFiles.markdownDescription: When saving the obfuscated file if a file of the same name exists overwrite it with the obfuscated file

JSObfuscator.subPathInWorkspace.markdownDescription: Specified some relative path where you only want to Obfuscate JavaScript

JSObfuscator.filesToIgnore.markdownDescription: Enter comma separated list of file names to be ignored

JSObfuscator.changeFileExtension.description:
Save the file with a new extension after obfuscating. For example if you put min.js the file would be changed from test.js to test.min.js and the file test.min.js would change to test.min.min.js as it only replaces the last extension on the file.

Note: to override same file just set this value blank and enable overwrite Existing Files

JSObfuscator.javascript-obfuscator.markdownDescription: Enter options to be passed into javascript-obfuscator see the [javascript-obfuscator documentation](https://www.npmjs.com/package/javascript-obfuscator#preset-options)
